Reviews.Content: Great little camera! I love the zoom and the pixalage. Pictures are very clear and easy to edit and has settings for different scenes. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Niki
Reviews.Content: Just poor picture quality. I had another camera I loved and paid the same 100$ for and figured I couldn't go too wrong with this camera as it has a 4 star review. The pictures are blurry, the lag between pressing the button (even when it's half pushed and 'ready') is so long it never takes the photo you want. I paid 70$ for this and I wish I had just went with a new version of my old camera. Very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Started Out GREAT!  Ended up a LEMON!
Reviews.Author: GAMommyof2
Reviews.Content: When I first got this camera August 2010, I LOVED it!  It took awesome pictures and the only thing I didn't like was that it didn't zoom in as much as my previous Kodak.  I learned to live with that.  However, now I've had the camera 9 months and nearly every picture I take is blurry.  I end up taking 3 or 4 pictures of the same thing trying to get a good picture.  It doesn't matter if the object/person is still or moving... Even still people/objects end up blurry.  So, I will be looking for a new camera in the near future and I really hate that I wasted my $120 at the time on this camera!  I didn't expect them to be as good as professional pictures, but I expect a camera to take decent pictures and not for the pictures to constantly be a blur... I can't print those and it's a waste of my time.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Pam  Meloy
Reviews.Content: I don't have much experience with cameras so this is easy to use. The picture quality is not great but since it is easy to use.  Works for me.

Reviews.Title: Horrible picture quality
Reviews.Author: B. Faktorovich "borisf"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is below my lowest expectations. At least I spent only 65 bucks for it. Also, battery lasts maybe 20 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Kodak digital C182
Reviews.Author: Xiomara E Ukena
Reviews.Content: This camera is so much easier than the others I used to have.  Maybe the technology has improved but I like the dial portion up to for various types of subjects and scenery.  I'm still learning how to use the camera(only taken out a couple of times)and having a little more to learn on the software portion of the pictures.  All in all, very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Takes excellent pictures for a $60 camera
Reviews.Author: Raptor
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. It's small and packed with a lot of good features that you would expect to find on a more expensive camera. There is only one thing that I do not like about this camera. It's the battery situation. You can not charge the camera's batteries by using a USB connection! But, it is still a good camera for a low price.

Reviews.Title: It's a battery eating monster.
Reviews.Author: islandgirl "fran"
Reviews.Content: Wish I would have reviewed this a little more before purchasing. We gave it to our grandaughter for Christmas. After 1/2 hour of usage the power gave out. We put more new batteries in for 2 days and it never did improve. I have noticed after the fact that many other people have had the same battery problem.  We returned it because of this fact. Amazon is great in this service oriented respect. So we never got much use out of it. It seem as though you either love this camera or get a battery eating monster. Don't recommend this model. Replaced it with the M530, it has a rechargeable battery.

Reviews.Title: A workhorse!
Reviews.Author: Tim Cantor
Reviews.Content: We are hard on cameras given the job we do. We got the C182 because of its high resolution but we've since learned that a feature far BETTER is its durability. We've dropped it, knocked it, banged it, and it just keeps on clicking. I think Kodak should consider marketing this workhorse as the sturdy little guy it is. when you add that to its nice, small size and great resolution, it's our hope that Kodak doesn't discontinue this jewel any time soon.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: kellee
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my daughter because I have on like it.  She LOVES it.  It is simple to use and takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: M. Williams
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 5 year old granddaughter for Christmas. She was taking pictures all day and has used it everyday since. She even made a scrapbook that she is so proud of. My son remarked that it was a nicer camera than the one he uses!

Reviews.Title: C182 for my granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Betty Jones
Reviews.Content: Since I already have a Kodak C182 myself I bought this one for my granddaughter. Mine has given me great pleasure to use since it is very easy to understand how to use it. My granddaughter's camera was stolen from her car and she couldn't afford to buy another one. While visiting us she fell in love with mine. When I saw this great deal on Amazon for the same camera, I jumped on it to buy one for her.We both use them regularly and take them everywhere we go. She's having a baby soon and the camcorder feature will come in very handy to film the event.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Corrie
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my mother in law and she loves it.  So easy to use and she is not very high tech savy...

Reviews.Title: A bad product
Reviews.Author: Rabi
Reviews.Content: I got this one for my trip overseas. The camera was hardly used for a day and then power was drained. Changed new battery twice but it did not work.  Something is wrong in its power supply circuit design. I came back from trip after six weeks and want to return the camera. Let me hope to return and get another one.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Modal c182
Reviews.Author: Robert A Hartsing
Reviews.Content: This is a nice easy camera to use my 82 year old mom found it easy to use right out of the box. It has a nice big well light back that you can see in day light . It is also fast .

Reviews.Title: Quality Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Sonic 1
Reviews.Content: My kids take MANY pictures of the grandkids.  They use a KODAK printer.  I bought 2 of these for each of my daughters.  They have nothing but good things to say.  It is very easy to use and some of the features are very useful, like the distance focus.  I highly recommend this camera for people who don't want to spend alot of money but want a good camera.  Battery life, we use only rechargeable batteries and they last a long time, many, many pictures!

Reviews.Title: Christmas present for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: J. Thompson "Janet's Treasures, a little of e...
Reviews.Content: My daughter's favorite color is purple....I got this camera for her to take to camp because they can't take their phones with them. She really loves it! Takes great pictures and having the little case for it is really great! (her last camera didn't have a case, and it got ruined being carried in her purse) I would definitely recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for price and for a tweeny.
Reviews.Author: dspin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 11 yr old daughter and she finds it very easy to use and uses it all the time. She even uploads on her own.

Reviews.Title: Get what u pay for
Reviews.Author: private0000000
Reviews.Content: Price is inexpensive, quality is ok, package does not come with driver so you must download it from Kodak.I downloaded the driver twice but keeps getting error message. Worst feature is battery life. U need to get rechargable or else the cost of battery replacement will soon offfset the cost of the camera. Would not pay more than $60 for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Used it for less than 5 months--will not work!!
Reviews.Author: Rhonda H. Clary
Reviews.Content: Great price, easy to use, etc. and after less than 5 months the camera will not turn on.  Now I have to deal with Kodak!!  I have replaced batteries to no avail!!

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: Sharondenc
Reviews.Content: I brought this Kodak camera for Christmas. This camera was easy to use. This camera took wonderful picture. Picture came out so clear. It is really easy to take good pictures with this camera. I highly recommend this camera. I was well please with the performance of this camera

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, One Problem
Reviews.Author: ShabamWow
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot. For the price and for what you get it just seems like a steal. The batteries don't last too long, but if you aren't using rechargeable AA batteries for your XBOX controllers, remotes, mice, cameras, etc., you're probably already wasting a lot of money. My only problem with this camera is that it didn't take very long for the labeling on the selector knob on top to wear off. Sure, the same labels shows up on the screen when the knob is rotated, but still it is inconvenient. That's why I only gave it four stars. Else I have nothing but good to say about this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures for the price
Reviews.Author: Savy Shopper
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my neice for xmas. She is 9 yrs old and she loved it!! The quality is great. the pictures are clear and it is 12MP WHICH IS REALLY GOOD FOR THE PRICE. It is small and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Easy Share
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is now my backup camera and everyone always comments on the photos that I post with it. Easy to use and great clarity.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Tanja Mitchell "Tanja"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift for Christmas and it took the best pictures. I even took it out for New Years Eve and with all the moving and excitement it still took great pictures. Easy to download and great online reviews. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Fuzzy Pictures
Reviews.Author: Genny Kidd
Reviews.Content: I have a problem with the "Whole" picture being clear.  I got the camera for Christmas and I did the settings, etc. Made 78 pictures New Year's Eve and the batteries where GONE!  When I down loaded the pictures I noticed that some of the people in the picture would be "Fuzzy" the one closest to the camera was clear.  I had the camera set on auto.  The next time I used the camera I noticed that it would show I was making a "Close Up" when I was trying to get several people in the picture, I would move the camera around until the CU was gone and then make the picture.  I haven't had time to down load the pictures, I hope this solved my problem. I had read the reviews of the camera using batteries like crazy, I thought it was people that did a lot of reviewing of their pictures, in my case it isn't because of reviewing it was making pictures.  I need to find a sale on AA batteries. I love everything else about the camera and the price of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Easiest Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: stacg45
Reviews.Content: Very intuitive camera. So simple even I can figure it out. Good picture quality simple to upload. Love it. Love it. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great for starters; drains batteries though
Reviews.Author: mxmanmom
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas present for our 5.5 year old.  He loves taking pictures and I prefer the digital to the print.  Buttons are easy to push and it takes clean pictures.  The only downside is that it uses AA batteries, but buy some rechargeable AAs and you'll be fine.

Reviews.Title: Easy camera to use
Reviews.Content: My 9 year old daughter received this camera in purple for Christmas.  She has had loads of fun with it!  It is simple to use.  It was a great Christmas gift.  I might suggest buying rechargeable batteries to keep on hand.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: GoldAngelMom
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas.  Really happy with the quality of the pictures considering that the cost was inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Brandi "Sometimes the most important words ar...
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter and she loves it! It's easy to use, quick point and shoot, video, and the color is perfect for a younger kid.

Reviews.Title: great and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. Schoenfelder "Klondike Kate"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 15 year old grandson for Christmas - he loves it and has had a lot of fun taking pictures of his friends and family. He posts the pictures on Facebook and has told me how much he loves the camera. It takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Hauff
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my new camera but do wish it had a better user manual. I don't really like going online for information - call me old fashion! This one is so much more convenient for the occasional photo and I didn't have to install new software. My other camera is Kodak EasyShare Z740 and, although a great camera, is too bulky for carrying around on a daily basis. Love the case, too! Very glad I happened to check Amazon when I did to find it.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money.
Reviews.Author: kelbycorp
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera that was purchased for a 9 year old as a Christmas gift.  She was thrilled and the camera performs well.  For the price (about $60) it was a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: Connie Fleming "68vettegirl"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for a Nikon point and shoot which did not last even a year.This is a great little camera with good picture quality.  The purchase price was even better.Thank you,

Reviews.Title: Kodax Easyshare C182
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice point-and-shoot and I'm glad to see that Kodak is getting back in the game.+ Nice selection of settings that, for the most part, are really good. I haven't tried the fireworks setting yet though or the beach one+ Manual settings if you want to mess around with the aperture and what not+ Scan setting works pretty well- Temperamental with light settings and did not really like the low light setting that much. For some worked really well, otherwise...not so much- Action setting...eh, not really very good in my opinionWhat you should really keep in mind is investing in the rechargeable lithium ion batteries. They cost a chunk of change compared to disposable batteries but when you see how quick this camera drains a normal pair of cheap AAs (5 minutes, easy) you'll see its well worth the investment. I have two and I just switch them out of the charger so I never have an issue. They last a good 5 hours.

Reviews.Title: Power thirst!
Reviews.Author: Zaeem Khalid
Reviews.Content: The battery life is awful! using ordinary cells, within a few minutes the battery is discharged. Should have invested in a lithium ion battery product, if only I had known about this problem!

Reviews.Title: Love It.
Reviews.Author: TAS
Reviews.Content: This is my the best one yet. It has a setting for everything. After playing with it for some time I noticed something. When inside and taking shots of any action going on I set the setting to "Children Inside Playing" instead of automatic. It takes to long for the camera to figure out what is the best setting. When panning through the different settings it gives a detailed definition of what the setting does. I am guessing that will be true with whatever shots I take. I am still learning. Great camera! It would hurt to have rechargable batteries and a good size SD card. I have a 8GB class 10. I got it from THEMEMSTORE.COM. I have bought twicw from them and have had great service.

Reviews.Title: Unique!
Reviews.Author: KateAus
Reviews.Content: Awesome.. we bought this product for my mother-in-law.. she was in desperate need of an upgrade and being that she loves purple, we loved it when we found it on the Kodak website. Only problem, they don't come in purple in Australia! Amazon to the rescue! It took a week or two to arrive but she now has one of the only purple ones in the country and she loves it, as it works almost exactly as her old one. Woohoo!

Reviews.Title: get camera
Reviews.Author: ufoundmeag
Reviews.Content: Can't complain, really easy to use. Has a lot of special scene settings, like bright beach scene or candlelight. It is really fun to use all the settings to get the look you want.

Reviews.Title: Great shot
Reviews.Author: A. C. Miller
Reviews.Content: The camera was a great buy and a size that would fit in her purse. It was reviewed by my son and approved for its intended use. The only change might have been the color but this way it won't get confused with other things in her purse.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: They need to make a rechargeable battery for this to be better.
Reviews.Author: crii-crii
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our 8 year old daughter for Christmas and she was thrilled.  The camera was easy to use and appears to take nice pictures.  The only problem, which to me is a big one, is that she couldn't use the camera for very long, (one hour?) and we would have to change the batteries.  We are returning the camera and want to find one that uses a rechargeable battery.  She has gone through 12 batteries and today is the 27th.  I should have read the description more closely and I would not have purchased one that uses AAA's.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Big Sis
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kodak EasyShare C182 for my younger sister and she is very happy with it.  It is easy to use and quality of the pictures are great!

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara T. Epperson
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent.  I like using batteries instead of waiting for the camera to charge.  Excellent buy!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: tweetcake
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mom and I wish I had kept it for myself! (Or at least bought myself one!) The pictures are so clear and the camera is so user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Too early to tell
Reviews.Author: David C. Meyer
Reviews.Content: Got it as a Christmas present for my sister. She has opened it and the batteries are in, and a couple of pictures taken. Have not downloaded anything or used the share function just yet. So far so good. I don't much know how to rate, as I'm not yet familiar with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Nathan A. Mccollum
Reviews.Content: The camera overall is GREAT!!! Just know that the camera isn't rechargeable and the stocked batteries it comes with are not at all charged...

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: This is a great Camera. I bought this camera with total confidence, Because i had read a lot of reviews for this camera and they were all wonderful reviews. The picture quality is beautiful. $90 for a 12 megapixel camera is just amazing. The camera is good for traveling because it's small and it can fit in just about anything,and the pictures like i said, are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: pattiwack0010
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. It takes really great pictures. Previous cameras I have owned have had a bad lag time between letting you take pictures. This one does not. It is easy to use also.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Jon Almada
Reviews.Content: This is a great point and shoot camera. Not nearly of the quality of some of my other cameras, but for quick and fast memory capturing for family functions, this little camera is perfect. I like the fact it uses AA batteries and has a large LCD screen in the rear to allow for simple framing to capture the image of your choice. I also like the video functionality - I used it in the recent eclipse and even though the image was pixelated, it did catch the moon entering into totality. A surprising result from such an inexpensive camera!All in all, I'd recommend it for most utilitarian purposes - I'm always glad when I buy Kodak point and shoot rigs...

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy ShareC182
Reviews.Author: Cynthia A. Gonzales "Cindicate831"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the promptness of this order. I received exactly when they said it would be here and I love the different screens built into the focus I can use in my picture taking.

Reviews.Title: An economic and easy share camera
Reviews.Author: marjorie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just three weeks ago, but it has been wonderful, the only thing I'm not really satisfied is that the pictures get dark when I use the flash, and if I don't use it the pictures get moved.  But the size of the screen and the quality of the pictures are very good.

Reviews.Title: The little camera that could.
Reviews.Author: Sara Lafargue
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kodak EasyShare C182.  I gave the first one to my daughter and immediately ordered another one for myself.  First of all it's so cute and I love the purple color. Second it takes good pictures and some video too, so it's just what I needed for everyday use.  It's a great little starter camera and I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: cannot automatically show date/time on fotos
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I discovered only after buying that you do not have the option to automatically show date/time on your fotos. You can only add date/time to fotos one at a time by an editing process that requires seven separate steps to accomplish. A very major software design defect, IMHO.Otherwise, an acceptable camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a grandparent!!!
Reviews.Author: JKChandler
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on Amazon for my grandmother's birthday. She loves pictures, but everyone always sends her prints and she isn't able to display them!! They just sit in boxes in her closet. I had once mentioned to her that she should get a digital camera, but she was very scared to use one.. she thought she would never understand it. I had been reseraching many different cameras to buy her. I wanted to make sure that a) it was extremely simple to use, b) the buttons were big, easy to see, and not complicated, c) the picture quality was pretty decent, d) the camera used AA batteries (so if the batteries died, she could replace them easily instead of having to recharge a rechargable battery when on vacation), and e) the camera was easy to hold, reducing the chances of dropping it, and not super small so that she wouldn't loose it.  This camera is just that!!! She LOVES IT! Now, she is able to easily, with confidence, take stunning pictures with no problem! Compared to my Cannon SD1300IS, I'm actually quite impressed. The pictures she takes have vivid colors, and are very crisp. :) The camera uses an SD card and i just purchased and 8in. Kodak EasyShare digital photo frame for her for christmas so that she can display her pictures without any problems. The only con that I have for this camera is that it eats batteries. But, that could be solved if she would just take them out of the camera when its not in use... Problem solved!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use good quality camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Dunstan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for a 7 year old girl.  It has been used on two trips and for numerous photo opportunities around the house.  It's fairly durable and shows little to no wear, but we're also not regularly dropping it on the floor.  We also try to make a habit of encouraging the use of the wrist strap when using the camera.  It may be a tad bit more expensive then some of the "kids" cameras out there but the picture quality more then makes up for the difference.  Uploading photos to the PC with with either the USB cable or by transfering the card to the card reader is as simple as any other Kodak I've used.  The controls are also simple enough for a child to figure out.  All in all this is a nice camera for the price and we've been very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare C182 Digital Camera (Silver) Kodak EasyShare C182 Digital Camera (Silver)
Reviews.Author: avmax "teacher of the Word"
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift to my daughter. She likes it because the photos are very sharp and clear. I haven't spoken to her much more about it.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Apples
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting a simple camera that takes good pictures and this is it. I bought it and it got here 4 days before it was supposed to. I've only had it for a few day but so far it's working great for me.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: .Larry C.
Reviews.Content: I got this camers for my brother for the holidays and he was able to use it well. He is not much on technoligy but he muddled through it well. He likes the camera a lot and has used it willingly. He likes the idea of no more film.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare C182 Digital Camera (Blue)
Reviews.Author: Judy Crowder "JC"
Reviews.Content: it goes through so many batteries i just hate it. i will never buy another battery camera again, if it dont have a charger im not buying it

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: Egor Svidritskiy
Reviews.Content: I got this camera broken, even it was completely new. I think you should consider a little bit more expensive but more reliable model.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Robin P. "bookl8dy"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase of this item.  It is exactly what I thought it would be.  A light weight small camera that takes excellent photographs.  It is easy to use and I love the color.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Kovacs
Reviews.Content: Having had the Kodak Z previously I was ready for an upgrade.  This has most all the features my more expensive Kodak had plus more.  The familiarity made it easier to use right out of the box.  I didn't realize it doesn't have a viewfinder but I really don't miss it.  (Use the LCD for aim/shoot).  This beauty has a 3" LCD which is wonderful for seeing recent shots. Size is good - just a bit bulkier than the "palm sized" but plenty small enough for my pocket.  I wish I had bought 3 of these - 2 for gifts.  Don't let the short battery life scare you - use rechargable batteries - they're cheaper anyway.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Early Rider "ER"
Reviews.Content: I've already used this camera to record video 4 bears in trees in northern Wisconsin and off shore speed boat racing in Clearwater Florida. It works great. I understood it used allot of batteries before I bought it but the only batteries it quickly destroyed were the ones that came with it. I'm only on my second set of batteries and have recorded and taken pictures worth about 1 Gig, this includes reviewing all the pictures and video clips several times while flying back on the jet. For the price I paid I could not go wrong. It will be in my pocket for hunting and snowmobile seasons for the next few years. I would buy another as a gift for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good as it gets
Reviews.Author: Amale97
Reviews.Content: Camera was simple to use small enough to put in pocket or purse and has performed excellant. I purchased the Camera for my son and he carries it with him everywhere. He has a camera in his phone but he likes the Kodack pictures better and School color helps too. In all the Kodak EasyShare C182 Digital Camera (Blue) has done a great job and the cost I couldn't beat anywhere else on the web.

Reviews.Title: Our 3rd Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: kiki
Reviews.Content: I usually use a Canon digital Rebel but my family loves the size and portability of the smaller camera. I purchased this camera as a gift for my oldest son. His first EasyShare he carried to Australia and New Zealand one summer about 5 years ago. His camera died a couple summers ago this was the perfect opportunity to replace it for him.

Reviews.Title: Good photos at low cost
Reviews.Author: Martin F. Thalison
Reviews.Content: This Kodak Easy Share is a good pocket camera to use for everyday type photos. The cost is unbeatable, and the quality is normal of all Kodak Cameras, average.  After testing the C182, shooting close-ups and normal shots, this camera exposure varies from slightly under exposed to normal depending which angle your light source is coming from. This a good camera for first buy, and older kids to use for school trips and events.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for a grandma!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Gerdes "Eitzy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mom because she needed something that was small but had a large screen and was EASY to use.  This camera is perfect for her.  It's great for someone that doesn't take a ton of pictures, but it feels a little "cheap" for one that you would use all the time and want to bring with you EVERYWHERE.  If you use the Energizer ultimate lithium AA batteries in here it will take TONS of pictures before you have to change them.  Picture quality is ok, but seems to take a little longer to take a picture than my point and shoot canon cameras.  The screen size is awesome, especially good for older people who have a harder time seeing in the screen and reading the menus.  Overall for the price, it's a good little camera.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Danika Amott "Danika"
Reviews.Content: We had two canon cameras before this but my kids dropped them both repeatedly and finally broke them.  I decided I'd just get this one for half the price until they were older.  It's definitely not as clear and doesn't have the good colors but what can I say?  It was half the price.Plastic is cheap feeling and thin, focus isn't as quick as my former camera, a lot of blurry pictures if subject is moving at all.I may end up getting another canon and letting the kids just use this one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty great Camera
Reviews.Author: KatieFix
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for another camera I own and I must say I love it! It's so quick and easy to use. I can pull it out and it's ready to go. I also like how easy it is to switch the picture settings. It's great for taking pictures of my infant daughter!

Reviews.Title: Kodak C182 easy to use
Reviews.Author: Fran Schlusemann "Book maven"
Reviews.Content: I've owned many cameras, & this Kodak C182 is the easiest and best yet.Fran Schlusemann

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Frank Bossio
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera and I would definitely recommend this camera to my friends.  Thank you Amazon...

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: A. Robidoux "beebidoux"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's birthday - he was turning three. He's very big on taking pictures and the toddler camera just wasn't cutting it image quality wise. He's great with being careful with electronics so we decided to get him a real camera. This one cost just $20 more than the toddler camera so why not? Needless to say, he loves it. It takes excellent pictures and is very easy to use. My son is a pro with it. It does use regular AA batteries which at first I wasn't a fan of but we got rechargeable ones and that's a much better fit for us.Highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Small compact and easy to take every where you go. Love the large viewing screen.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!  Just love it :)
Reviews.Author: mayabfox
Reviews.Content: I just love my new camera.  I just had a new baby and needed a new camera to take pictures.  I like Kodak they are easy to use and quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Best little camera ever
Reviews.Author: Brandy McDonald
Reviews.Content: I adore Kodak EasyShare C182 Digital Camera, it was very affordable, and it got here much faster then I expected. I love it and use it ever chance I get

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Blanche DuBois
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for someone who wants simplicity and ease of use. A great price and a pretty color!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME little camera!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: A friend bought this camera so I fooled with it some. Nice big screen and very high quality pics. I take pics of products for my business website. My old camera was fine but too small of screen to tell what pics were like until downloaded.For the money there is NO other digital camera this easy to use, high quality pics at 12 megapixels that I've found. Can highly recommend it. So nice.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera, Perfect Price!
Reviews.Author: Ctorr10
Reviews.Content: Until now I have never owned my own camera. When I decided that it was time to get one for college, I wasn't thrilled by the prices I was seeing for others cameras much like this one. The minute I saw this camera (and the price), I knew I wanted it. I am glad I made that decision! This camera works great! It takes clearer pictures than my dad's HP camera. Furthermore, The battery life is great! I have taken over 300 pictures with this camera since I received it and there is not even a dent in the battery life. The pictures have great quality--my favorites are the macro shots-- and it is so easy to download them onto my computer. This is a great purchase! If you do not like replacing batteries every now and then, it really helps (and pays for itself) to get rechargeable.

Reviews.Title: NIGHT PHOTO'S A BUST
Reviews.Author: C. Robert Ganun
Reviews.Content: I was very excited when I received my Kodak EasyShare C182.  After going out and buying a rechargable battery kit I was off taking photo's.  Amagine my dissapointment when I started taking night shots and all the photos came out dark.  The Flash is not keeping up with the shot.  No matter what setting I put the camera on, the Flash always fires late.  I am very dissapointed in this camera.

Reviews.Title: kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Hansen
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera for the price.  Larger screen than other brands at a much higher price.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: DarkHorseman
Reviews.Content: Most reviews I read on this product were excellent and well informative - this product lives up to its reviews.  I love this camera, it fits well in my pocket, and it does well on batteries despite what others might say, most consumer grade cameras of this type consume lots of battery power very quickly anyways.  (One helpful thing is to not turn the camera on or off two frequently than you need to.  It drains the battery more turning it on and off then just leaving it on for a minute to take your next picture.)  Also some people like to use rechargeable batteries on these, I don't.  I think rechargeable batteries can be undependable at times, and lose their strength after little use.  I like the cheap alkaline, you can buy more of them cheaply and get just as much use out of them as some descent rechargeable units.  (but that's just my observation, it's your camera if you buy it, do whatever makes your usage enjoyable) I love the big LCD screen, it makes picture taking much more enjoyable.  Make sure you get a good 4gig sd card.  The onboard memory like most cameras is only enough to take about 30 pictures.So overall fantastic camera for the price, great quality!

Reviews.Title: Great camera with great features
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kodak EasyShare. The new one offers a panoramic feature that I discovered on my own and made me jump up and down like a little kid at Christmas getting their favorite toy. I take it absolutely everywhere and always get great shots. I also understand the limitations of flash (closeup shots tend to lose their depth of field) and usually shoot without. This has made for some interesting effects.

Reviews.Title: easy for elders
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother who is 90.  She loves it because it is easy to use. I have one exactly like it in blue and I love mine too. Pictures are clear.  Big screen.  Easy to hold. Reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: C182
Reviews.Author: AKRON
Reviews.Content: Camera works great.  I am disappointed the date stamp can not be set to record automatically.  The information from Kodak said it has a date stamp but does not say you have to date each picture.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST DEAL EVER
Reviews.Author: A. Santos-probst "Babydoll"
Reviews.Content: THIS DIGITAL CAMERA WAS THE BEST DECITION EVER THE PICTURE ARE GREAT AS WELL THE VIDEO I RECOMEND THIS SELLER AND ALL THE PRODUCTS

Reviews.Title: do not recommend
Reviews.Author: NEY
Reviews.Content: Our previous Kodak camera kicked the bucket, and my husband went out and found this one.  It is okay for the price, but I've gone through 2 sets of batteries in 1 weekend...and that isn't even with constant use.  It is so frustrating not to have a charger and to have to replace batteries so often.  I'm actually not sure we are going to keep this camera.  We really enjoyed the other Kodak camera we had.  This one just isn't up to par.

Reviews.Title: Super gift for a 6-year old
Reviews.Author: Savta
Reviews.Content: This EasyShare camera is a full featured camera for the price, about as much as should be spent for a 6-year old.  Camera is easy to hold.  It has a large 3" viewer.  Photos are sharp.  Takes AA batteries, so that she doesn't necessarily have to remember to charge the camera.  If she has photo talent, the EasyShare C182 has plenty of features to learn and use.

Reviews.Title: Top Noch Kodak Camara
Reviews.Author: Karl Kerwin
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kodak C182 12 Mega Pixel to replace the 5 Mega Pixel camera I bought many years ago. I have to say it is an excellent camera.  Its view screen is amazing. We've taken pictures and can review them with ease on the large screen behind the camera. The Kodak C182 also used the same USB cord that are previous camera used and happy say with the same ease of down loading. Lithium batteries work best.  We've taken over 500 pictures on the same two AA's.  It would be nice if their was a rechargable dock for the camera. I hope we can get another 5 to 6 years out of this camera too.

Reviews.Title: c 182 review
Reviews.Author: Sandy J. Gudaitis
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful clear camera ! a great buy and well worth the money. So many nice features too.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't live up to the Kodak name
Reviews.Author: NMC "hiker"
Reviews.Content: This camera has been a disappointment.  The hinged battery cover doesn't close properly.  After only using it for 2 months, we've had problems turning the camera on.  It's been impossible to download pictures to our computer.  We also own a Kodak M1063, which downloads pictures using the USB cord effortlessly.  I have not been able to download pictures with this C182 using the USB cord.  I've had to use an SD card reader to download pictures from the SD card.  This camera has created such a hassle for us that I'm going to replace it.  Hopefully, Amazon will work with me to return and replace it.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this camera
Reviews.Author: R. Worthem
Reviews.Content: I thought Kodak was suppose to be good?  Well this one is not.  First off I could not get the battery cover to close, I finally did but thought I was going to break it.  Then the sucker would not even turn on.  My husband messed with it and it finally turned on. We only took a few shots and set up the camera and the battery was half gone already.  I really can't say how the pictures are because the few that I did take I didn't even put in the computer.  Let's not forget the noise it makes at times when it is turned on.  A camera makes noise?  This one does.I am returning this camera ASAP!Other buyers beware.  I read the reviews for it on other sites, I should have gone to Amazon to read the reviews before buying this camera.I don't mind the battery life because I was aware of it so that does not bother me in the least.  I was actually looking forward to a battery that I didn't have charge up.  Will I get another Kodak, I probably will but not this one.

Reviews.Title: ridiculous rebuild
Reviews.Author: Susan B. Frost "Susan Frost"
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished camera for my grandson's 10th birthday and thought this one would be perfect. Unfortunately, It wouldn't even turn on! Why wouldn't it turn on? Well, after much e-mailing and taking the camera home which (required mailing it back to aforesaid grandson), it turns out that the battery terminal indicators are incorrect and one must insert the batteries in upside down! Hope that is all that is wrong with it. It was an easy fix, but a very annoying problem.  S. F.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare Camera
Reviews.Author: rmb
Reviews.Content: Camera looked like it would be easy to use but the screen didn't light up. Arrived in a reasonable timeframe but the package was coming apart.

Reviews.Title: Why? When there is no need to
Reviews.Author: Florenzo
Reviews.Content: Why do people gravitate toward other point and shoot cameras and not Kodak?I used to be a Canon man, but Kodak's quality, build and ease of use has won me over.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C-182 Camera
Reviews.Author: clee5000
Reviews.Content: The Kodak C-182 Camera is pretty good and durable. The only problem I have with this camera is that, it doesn't charge the battery and it doesn't uploaded it to the computer when you put it on to Facebook or MySpace. The thing is you have to put your SD memory card and put it into the slot into computer and upload the computer.

Reviews.Title: I dont do reviews but...
Reviews.Author: Utah Ron
Reviews.Content: This camera is exceptional. I waited until it was about half price and jumped on it here at Amazon and got it for around $125 with free shipping.I have never been fond of acrylic (plastic) lenses as they simply cannot replace glass. Additionally the size of the lens (speed) is minimal. The 12 megapixel is meaningless as you can jam as many sensors as you wish in the smallest area and call it a "mega mega pixel" camera.ButThis thing is easy to use and the quality of image is every bit the quality of Nikon or Canon in the same class and the price is less than half... sigh. I remember when Kodak was the number one name in photography and everyone else was trying to elbow their way into the market and had to offer twice the quality at half the price. Now Kodak is in the back seat and struggling to regain brand name.With this camera they have.Its a battery eater though... keep lots of spares.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare C182 blue digital camera
Reviews.Author: D. Finklea "dee"
Reviews.Content: I just ordered my Kodak Easyshare digital camera and it is excellent.  I've already taken it out the box, took pictures and is exploring everything it can do.  I put the order in a few days ago and it arrived today Thurs. (7/08) already even though I wasn't expecting it until later just as described new, wow.  Now that's great and speedy service and I would definitely recommend this camera and the seller to anyone looking for a reasonably inexpensive camera to take and share those special moments.

Reviews.Title: great deal and quality photos
Reviews.Author: S. Wilhelm
Reviews.Content: I love it. The battery option is great when I am out doing shoots. The quality is great and the functionality is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: I like blue
Reviews.Author: Teresa Arminio
Reviews.Content: This is the second kodak  I have recieved from amazon the first one didn't flash and this one is making a little noise. I love the 3" display of pictures and it is easy to use it is not made well I am going to return.

Reviews.Title: My Old Canon was Better
Reviews.Author: Calamity Jane
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Software is fine. The cropping feature is annoying. You have to place your cursor exactly in the corner of the window before cropping to size, otherwise the entire window moves in a direction you don't want it to go. Downloading the pictures is easy, as is taking the pictures with or without the flash.But we buy cameras for the end results, not ease of use, and this Kodak fails.My old Canon Powershot A520 with only 4-pixels took better and clearer photos than this 12-pixel Kodak. I don't understand why that is. I expected much sharper images with a higher pixel camera.If you're on a budget and want a cheap camera that takes okay pictures, this Kodak is for you. Make sure you keep a stash of extra batteries in your pocket. This camera eats them for lunch.I would not purchase another one. I'll return to the Canon, probably before this Kodak expires.

Reviews.Title: Software
Reviews.Author: John D "John D"
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 ...just different colors.  I received the cameras very quickly...Thank You! They are both the same model C-182BUT!.... Each came in different packaging. The one that came in the box had all the accessories including the installation software.The other that came in the shrinkwrap packing did not have any installation software.  This does not give me a lot of confidence.

Reviews.Title: Great picture/video quality
Reviews.Author: Jeanine Just
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kodak easy share for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it.The picture and video quality is excellent.The only problem I have with the Kodak is the Easy share is not easy when it comes to uploading the videos to Youtube, it wasn't Easy! especially for 10 or 11yr. old child to go to [...] to transfer his pictures/videos to Youtube it was confusing for him.Don't get me wrong, but Kodak should've made it a little easier to upload the vids to [...] .As for my other Camaras like Nikon & Canon we don't have a problem uploading our videos straight to Youtube or anywhere else for that matter.I got a 2.0 thumb drive where he can slide the memory card in and that made it so much easier for him to upload his pics/vids straight to his (my pics)files where he had them originally.He really likes his camara a lot but the only downfall he had was the headache of uploading his videos to Youtube as for any kid these days.

Reviews.Title: christmas present
Reviews.Author: Woney Bear
Reviews.Content: My daughter asked specifically for this model. She loves the picture quality, easy of use and portability! I got her an 8g memory and she is ready to go!!

Reviews.Title: i returned it
Reviews.Author: babs a.
Reviews.Content: the quality didn't seem to be there and we decided to buy a canon camera. That doesn't seem to be too good either and i'm sure we need to pay a little more for a better one.  It is for a ten year old boy, so I was looking for a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: loganx
Reviews.Content: This item wasn't what was advertised . very unhappy with whole purchase, don't buy here. this item didnt have any cables, books, and box was dirty.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: hawki
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera used it a few times. Then set it down picked up up a few minutes later and the window would not show anything. I sent it in to be checked out and they told me it had compression damage on the display window. "IMPOSSIBLE" it was set on the table and picked up again. Repair people said it would cost over $100 to fix it. I e-mailed Kodak and never ever got a response. So we went out and bought a Sony. THANKS KODAK all those years of using your product now waisted no more return business from me!!

Reviews.Title: Might be the best but we'll never know
Reviews.Author: Antero Pietila
Reviews.Content: This seemed tailor-made for my wife's needs. So I got one for her as a birthday present. The on/off switch never worked. We are going with a Nikon Coolpix L22.

Reviews.Title: Not a good product
Reviews.Author: Sealin
Reviews.Content: This camera is good at looking but bad in quality. It needs 6-7 seconds to "recover" from the previous picture shoot. The picture quality is not good either. I tried to record a video at our party, but the quality was bad. I couldn't see the video clearly when playing it. May it is because of the low price. But I would rather choose the Sony or Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an early Christmas present. Since opening, it wont even stay on,and we've replace the batteries many times. My window to return the item expired before we even opened the box. No wonder it was a "special deal."

Reviews.Title: no sound on playback
Reviews.Author: ndpsfan
Reviews.Content: We bought this item online as a gift for our 13 year old. She did a bit of comparing and really liked what was offered for the price. However, we did not know that the video playback has no sound due to the fact that the camera has no speakers. The only way to get the full video experience is to download it on a computer. Thats a drag!So, we returned it. Cant really comment on other aspects/features because we no longer wanted the camera, but everything seemed o.k.

Reviews.Title: I was tricked
Reviews.Author: Clee
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera at Walmart.  I was told that it captures videos; however when I opened the package the brochure is very scanty and it does not at all mention doing videos with the camera.  it takes good pictures but I am disappointed about the video.Was I duped?

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: D. Berkley
Reviews.Content: Bought the silver and the plum as gifts for my daughters- opened up on Christmas- and the silver does not work. Tried charging - won't turn on. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Out of box failure
Reviews.Author: Melody P.
Reviews.Content: I wanted to love this camera. I purchased it for my daughter for Christmas. The price was right...and the color is a true PURPLE, which she loved. Unfortunately, I didn't check it before Christmas eve and as it happened, would not power on. Fortunately, Amazon is easy to work with on returns. I will consider this a lesson learned, and will always check my electronics in plenty of time for "out of box failure".

Reviews.Title: kodak easyshare
Reviews.Author: deemann1265
Reviews.Content: Camera has a poor internal memory, not alot of features at all. I guess the old saying you get what you pay for is appropiate! I suggest spending a little more and getting a better camera.

Reviews.Title: old school batterys
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: We actually didn't like this camera because it has regular batterys as opposed to rechargeable ones. We are going to send it back to amazon.

Reviews.Title: Purple bundle is not a bundle
Reviews.Author: busy mom
Reviews.Content: The purple "bundle" does not include the items you would normally see in a bundle package.  The bundle = a cheap case, nothing else.  I'm returning for this reason.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have known there was no way to watch the videos you take with sound.  I dont have a working computer right now so I cant play back anything I recorded.

Reviews.Title: Great starter camera for my daughter
Reviews.Author: D. Smith
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a person to start off with to see if advanced photography is thier thing. Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Maria M
Reviews.Content: The camera filled all of my expectations, is excellent and very good prices. I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Pissed off !!!!!
Reviews.Author: nylon-addict
Reviews.Content: I was really looking forward to  receiving the camera,but to my surprise it DOES NOT WORK! I'm so upset,now i'm going to have to return it,what a major disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Does Not Work!
Reviews.Author: momo8404
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera knowing it ws refurbished and I took the chance.  But I received it and it does not work.  Does not hold a charge and does not take pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Vincent Gervasi "VINMAN4"
Reviews.Content: I was not happy that I had to buy a memory card. I thought they came with camera. Once I put the card in and began using camera it took nice pictures. Instructions were not as clear as they should be but once you figure it out it is a nice little camera

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare C182
Reviews.Author: MrsShopurtunistic ""Rica""
Reviews.Content: My sister had a Kodak Easyshare and I fell in love with it but I didn't like that there was no sound on the videos. When I purchased this model it was a newer model than hers so I thought that it would be upgraded with speakers. I was wrong. It takes decent pictures and is easy to use but the other part totally makes it suck. Why should the camera be capable of recording videos if it's not capable of recording sound? Kodak dropped the ball on this one. With this being said I paid $85 on amazon.com, way too much if you ask me, and today Oct 8, 2011 I see it's selling for $125.00, I wouldn't dare pay that much. There are much better cameras at lower prices.EDITING REVIEW: Other customers have told me that the C182 does have sound, just not during playback on the camera. This to me still makes little sense, but I do like the camera and if I find this to be true...since I'm at work I can't check that--but I'm have the faith--then I apologize to Kodak for getting a little angry! Hope that makes everyone happy! I still wouldn't pay more than $60 for it if I had it to buy all over again.And I'm adding a star since my first review was 3 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Not good for the price
Reviews.Author: TMaz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera, and received it rather quickly. It was the first digital camera I have ever owned. I buy from Amazon all the time, and have received great products. However, upon receiving this camera, it became immediately apparent that I would soon regret it. From the first use the camera would make a low running sound when it was powered on. The lens would zoom out as it should, but the LCD screen would go blank, like the camera was off, but the lens would still be zoomed out. The camera would do this intermittently. After only owning the camera for 2 months, it quit working on me all together. No matter how many batteries I tried, it would not even power on. Once I contacted customer service at amazon, I found the return process very simple and I received a refund quickly. This has, unfortunately, discouraged me from purchasing any electronics online. I would like to believe that I just received a defective camera, but I will not purchase another digital camera from this site again.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: Doris Stephens
Reviews.Content: This camera never worked.  Was ordered for a birthday gift for November 21st.  Could not return because it was past date.  Buyers beware when shopping here for a future date!!

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy it; it has Battery malfunctions
Reviews.Author: Pablo Fallas
Reviews.Content: it Burns out so quick you cannot even take 5 pictures. the worse product I have ever bought. completely useless.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Mohammed Abdulla Qassim "mido"
Reviews.Content: fast service , good item  but the only thing is the battries of camera i cant recharge , i should buy the recharger and when i record video i have no sound only pic

Reviews.Title: QUALITY BELOW AVERAGE
Reviews.Author: CHARLIE
Reviews.Content: CANON EASY SHARE C182.I WANTED A CAMERA I COULD CARRY IN MY POCKET/PURSE.  I HAVE A LARGE NIKON, BUT YOU NEVER KNOW WHEN YOU WANT A QUICK SHOT - BUT THE DIALS ON THIS CAMERA, MOVED TOO EASILY, AND WOULD MOSTLY BE IN A WRONG POSITION.  I HAVE HAD THE CAMERA LESS THAN A YEAR, AND NOW - IT REQUESTS THE TIME/DATE BE SET, BUT I DON'T LIKE THIS ON MY PICTURES.....SO WHEN YOU PUT CANCEL - IT GOES TO A BLANK SCREEN AND YOU ARE DONE. I HAVE REVIEWED CAMERAS UNTIL MY EYES ACHE - WILL PROBABLY GO TO A  NIKON  - CANON CAMERAS ARE JUST A PIECE OF JUNK AND I NO LONGER ENJOY THE KODAK.................JUST BECAUSE THE PRICE IS LOW, DOESN'T MEAN YOU SHOULD GET A PIECE OF JUNK...............

Reviews.Title: Item was on sale and returned because not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Laura R. Ludlow
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a digital camera and when I saw this item being on sale - I decided to buy one.  I believe that after taxes, the camera cost about $64 because shipping was free.  However, when the camera finally arrived, I totalled up the extra monies I would have to pay and it came to over $100 which is why I returned the camera.  For example, the camera did NOT come with a memory card, and it only came with normal type batteries and I would have had to buy both a charger and chargeable batteries plus a memory card.  Actually, the only item I had expected to buy would have been a camera case which, of course, this item also did not come with.  Also, being brand new to using a digital camera, I was very unsatisfied that more detailed user instructions were only "on line" and I felt I was learning a new software all over again.  The next time I decide to buy a digital camera, I will purchase one in a store where I can get assistance from a sales person and also make sure that the camera at least comes with a memory card and chargeable batteries as being part of the inital price.

Reviews.Title: Wasn't for me...
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Meisner
Reviews.Content: I didn't like the quality of the photos.  I did like its flash features!  I bought a Canan A1100S which is great - what a great photo/picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift/Unopened
Reviews.Author: Rose "Moi"
Reviews.Content: Can't give you an accurate quality review, since the gift is yet unopened.  Ask me after Christmas?  Happy with the delivery and appearance, so far.rose

Reviews.Title: use
Reviews.Author: James E. Thompson
Reviews.Content: We hav,t had much use yet,the first one crapped out right away but Amazon was quick to take care of the problem[return same and replace with same] Jim Thompson

Reviews.Title: Bait and Switch
Reviews.Author: Diana Liley "Gamer Girl"
Reviews.Content: I placed this item on my wish list...looked like a nifty item at the price of $69.Today I checked my wishlist and the item now costs $169. I deleted the item from my wishlist. I'm embarassed that I had such a costly item on the list.I'm disappointed on many fronts.

Reviews.Title: Great for my Daughter
Reviews.Author: Allison Schultheis
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my then 6 year old, she is 8 now and still has this camera and it still works great.  The pictures aren't fantastic but it definitely does the job of capturing the moment.
